response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offer not only provides you with substantial savings but also allows me to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this partnership beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 9500}
